Haryana: Education department orders closure of 20 private schools in Nuh
The education department has ordered the immediate closure of 20 private schools across Nuh after they were found operating without proper govt recognition.
Nuh: The education department has ordered the immediate closure of 20 private schools across Nuh after they were found operating without proper govt recognition.

"These include small play schools, and we've heard they even teach up to class 10."
He said a survey was also conducted two years ago to identify such institutions. When asked about school fees, Dhankhar said, "They cannot charge school fees. They don't have the authority to run these schools. Whatever they are doing is illegal." The officer said that the department does not have an exact number of students enrolled in these schools.
He said the education department will make arrangements for the admission of these children to other schools after the summer holidays.
